content.rendered:
Directed by Aashiq Abu

Written by Unni R.

Star Tovino Thomas (Chandra Prakash). Lukman Lukku (Amos). Rajesh Madhavan (Manu). Anna Ben (Shakira Muhammad).Indrans . Sharafudheen (Pradeep John). Jaffer Idukki (Purambokkilachan). Renji Panicker (Govinda Menon). Vijayaraghavan (Babuji). Sharik Khan (Amol). Joy Mathew (Kurup). Koottickal Jayachandran (Shivarajan). Swetha Vinod (PCR room controller). Kunchan (Gurudasan (Minister of Finance)). Nazlin Saleem (Parvathy). Kumar Sethu (Journalist). Archana Suresh (News Panelist).Balachandran Chullikadu . Jayaraj Warrier (Prakash). Raghunath Paleri (Lawrence). Fejo (Mudiyan). Dileesh Nair (Freddy). Imthiaz Muhammed (Reporter)

Language Malayalam

Producers Aashiq Abu. Abid Abu. Wazim Hyder. Rima Kallingal. Santhosh T. Kuruvilla

Production OPM Cinemas
